Subjects: Virgin Mary, hymns to; hymns, to Virgin Mary

BodRawlite3.First Lines:
…ar vndir thyne obedienceand do the
                    wurschippyng…
BodRawlite3.Last Lines:
…but ioye and euer encresewhile almyghti god reyneth in
                    heuen
BodRawlite3.Note:
Missing lines 1-18 due to loss of folio; four 6-line stanzas, aabccb
                    plus two lines.

Lam306.First Lines:
Gaude the flowre of virgynyteIn heuyn thow hast a
                    principalite
Lam306.Last Lines:
…But euermore endure and encresseWhile god regnyth in heuyn
                    Amen
Lam306.Editions:
Furnivall,  Frederick James,
                        ed.  
             Political, Religious and Love Poems, from Lambeth MS. 306 and other
                sources.
